name: Jump Lab
description:
Jump lab is a school projet that has education as it's main theme, it was made as a tool to learn about platformer character and help you create your own.

  

To move around and jump you can use:

"WASD"/"ZQSD" or the arrow keys.

You can also use the "Spacebar" to jump.

To control the in-game module and interact with them you can use your mouse.

To switch from Windowed to FullScreen use the "F" key

And to quit the game use "escape"

  

-The tutorial 

You will learn how to use the different game modules and tools and teach you some of the platformer mechanic you can use.

-The Testing ground

You will be able to learn about all the mechanics you can modifiy to create  your own platformer character. It also includes a mini editor where you can click on blocks to create different mini-levels to test the different mechanics and tune your character to your liking.
